ranks.name: Snowbound Maiden, Memory to Tomb
ranks.desc: When the enemy target's current HP is 80%/50% of Max HP or lower, the DMG dealt to it by "Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace," "Claw Splits the Veil," "Breath Scorches the Shadow," and "Wings Sweep the Ruins" is 120%/140% of the original DMG respectively.

ranks.name: Crown on Wings of Bloom
ranks.desc: After summoning the memosprite Netherwing, Castorice gains 2 stack(s) of "Ardent Will." "Ardent Will" can stack up to 2 time(s) and can be used to offset the HP cost of Netherwing's Memosprite Skill, "Breath Scorches the Shadow" and advance Castorice's action by 100%. When using the next Enhanced Skill, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to30% of max "Newbud."

ranks.name: Pious Pilgrim, Dance in Doom
ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Rest in Songs of Gloom
ranks.desc: While Castorice is on the field, all allies' Incoming Healing during HP restoration increases by 20%.

ranks.name: Pristine Pages, Prophecy as Plume
ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Await for Years to Loom
ranks.desc: When Castorice or Netherwing deals DMG, increases Quantum RES PEN by 20%. During Netherwing's attacks, can reduce enemy Toughness regardless of Weakness Types. When breaking Weaknesses, triggers the Quantum Weakness Break effect. And the number of Bounces for Netherwing's Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins" additionally increases by 3.

skills.name: Lament, Nethersea's Ripple
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one enemy.
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Castorice's Max HP to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Silence, Wraithfly's Caress
skills.simple_desc: Consumes all allies' HP. Deals Quantum DMG to one enemy and minor Quantum DMG to adjacent targets.
skills.desc:
Consumes #1[i]% of all allies' current HP. Deals Quantum DMG equal to #2[i]% of Castorice's Max HP to one designated enemy and Quantum DMG equal to #3[i]% of Castorice's Max HP to adjacent targets.
If the current HP is insufficient, reduces the current HP down to 1.
If Netherwing is on the battlefield, the Skill becomes "Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace" instead.

skills.name: Doomshriek, Dawn's Chime
skills.simple_desc: Summons the memosprite Netherwing and advances its action by 100%. At the same time, deploys a Territory that decreases All-Type RES for all enemies.
skills.desc:
Summons the memosprite Netherwing and advances its action by 100%. At the same time, deploys the Territory "Lost Netherland," which decreases all enemies' All-Type RES by #4[i]%. If Castorice has the DMG Boost effect from her Talent, then this effect spreads to Netherwing. Netherwing has an initial SPD of #1[i] and a set Max HP equal to #3[i]% of max "Newbud."
After Netherwing experiences #2[i] turns or when its HP is 0, it disappears and dispels the Territory "Lost Netherland."

skills.name: Desolation Across Palms
skills.simple_desc: When allies lose HP, Castorice gains "Newbud". Increases Castorice's and Netherwing's DMG dealt. When "Newbud" reaches its maximum limit, can activate the Ultimate. While Netherwing is on the field, HP lost by allies (except Netherwing) will be converted to an equal amount of HP for Netherwing.
skills.desc:
The maximum limit of "Newbud" is related to the levels of all characters on the battlefield. For every 1 point of HP lost by all allies, Castorice gains 1 point of "Newbud." When "Newbud" reaches its maximum limit, can activate the Ultimate. When allies lose HP, Castorice's and Netherwing's DMG dealt increases by #2[i]%. This effect can stack up to #3[i] time(s), lasting for #4[i] turn(s).
When Netherwing is on the field, "Newbud" cannot be gained through Talent, and HP lost by all allies (except Netherwing) will be converted to an equal amount of HP for Netherwing.

skills.name: Attack
skills.simple_desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Wail, Death's Herald
skills.simple_desc:
Enters the "Netherveil" state. Enemies are unable to actively approach Castorice.
During "Netherveil," attacks will cause all enemies within range to enter combat. At the same time, summons the memosprite Netherwing, advances its action by 100%. Upon entering battle, consumes HP of all allies (except Netherwing).
If Netherwing is not summoned after entering battle, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to 30% of max "Newbud."
skills.desc:
After using Technique, enters the "Netherveil" state that lasts for #3[i] seconds. While "Netherveil" is active, enemies are unable to actively approach Castorice.
During "Netherveil," active attacks will cause all enemies within range to enter combat. At the same time, summons the memosprite Netherwing, advances its action by 100%, and deploys the Territory "Lost Netherland." Netherwing has its current HP equal to #2[i]% of max "Newbud." After entering battle, consumes #1[i]% of the current HP of all allies (except Netherwing).
If Netherwing is not summoned after entering battle, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to #4[i]% of max "Newbud."

skills.name: Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace
skills.simple_desc: Consumes all allies' HP. Castorice and Netherwing launch Joint ATK on the targets, dealing Quantum DMG to all enemies.
skills.desc:
Consumes #1[i]% of the current HP of all allies (except Netherwing). Castorice and Netherwing launch Joint ATK on the targets, dealing Quantum DMG equal to #2[f1]% and #3[f1]% of Castorice's Max HP to all enemies.
If the current HP is insufficient, reduces the current HP down to 1.

skills.name: Claw Splits the Veil
skills.simple_desc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to all enemies.
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[f1]% of Castorice's Max HP to all enemies.

skills.name: Breath Scorches the Shadow
skills.simple_desc: Consumes this unit's HP to deal Quantum DMG to all enemies. And this turn will not conclude. When using this ability repeatedly, the ability can be enhanced up to 3 times. When HP is 25% or lower, using this ability will actively trigger the ability effect of Memosprite Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins."
skills.desc:
Launching "Breath Scorches the Shadow" will consume #1[i]% of Netherwing's Max HP to deal Quantum DMG equal to #2[f1]% of Castorice's Max HP to all enemies.
In one attack, "Breath Scorches the Shadow" can be launched repeatedly, with the DMG multiplier increased progressively to #3[f1]% / #4[f1]%. After reaching #4[f1]%, it will not increase further. The DMG Multiplier Boost effect will not decrease before Netherwing disappears.
When Netherwing's current HP is equal to or less than #5[i]% of its Max HP, launching this ability will actively reduce HP down to 1, and then trigger the ability effect equal to that of the Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins."

skills.name: Mooncocoon Shrouds the Form
skills.simple_desc: When Netherwing is on the field, it acts as backup for allies. Allies' current HP can be reduced down to a minimum of 1, after which Netherwing will bear the DMG received or the HP consumed.
skills.desc: When Netherwing is on the field, it acts as backup for allies. When allies take DMG or consume HP, their current HP can be reduced down to a minimum of 1, after which Netherwing will consume HP at #1[i]% of the original value until Netherwing disappears.

skills.name: Roar Rumbles the Realm
skills.simple_desc: When summoned, increases the DMG dealt by all allies.
skills.desc: When Netherwing is summoned, increases DMG dealt by all allies by #1[i]%, lasting for #2[i] turn(s).

skills.name: Wings Sweep the Ruins
skills.simple_desc: Upon disappearing, deals minor Quantum DMG to one enemy that Bounces a total of 6 time(s). At the same time, restores HP for all allies.
skills.desc: When Netherwing disappears, deals #2[i] instance(s) of DMG, with each instance dealing Quantum DMG equal to #1[f1]% of Castorice's Max HP to one random enemy. At the same time, restores HP by an amount equal to #3[i]% of Castorice's Max HP plus #4[i] for all allies.

skills.name: Breath Scorches the Shadow
skills.simple_desc: Consumes this unit's HP to deal Quantum DMG to all enemies. And this turn will not conclude. When using this ability repeatedly, the ability can be enhanced up to 3 times. When HP is #5[i]% or lower, using this ability will actively trigger the ability effect of Memosprite Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins."
skills.desc: Consumes this unit's HP to deal Quantum DMG to all enemies. And this turn will not conclude. When using this ability repeatedly, the ability can be enhanced up to 3 times. When HP is #5[i]% or lower, using this ability will actively trigger the ability effect of Memosprite Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins."

skills.name: Breath Scorches the Shadow
skills.simple_desc: Consumes this unit's HP to deal Quantum DMG to all enemies. And this turn will not conclude. When using this ability repeatedly, the ability can be enhanced up to 3 times. When HP is #5[i]% or lower, using this ability will actively trigger the ability effect of Memosprite Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins."
skills.desc: Consumes this unit's HP to deal Quantum DMG to all enemies. And this turn will not conclude. When using this ability repeatedly, the ability can be enhanced up to 3 times. When HP is #5[i]% or lower, using this ability will actively trigger the ability effect of Memosprite Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins."

skills.name: Wings Sweep the Ruins
skills.simple_desc: Consumes all HP and deals minor Quantum DMG to one enemy that Bounces a total of 6 time(s). At the same time, restores HP for all allies.
skills.desc: Consumes all HP and deals #2[i] instance(s) of DMG, with each instance dealing Quantum DMG equal to #1[f1]% of Castorice's Max HP to one random enemy. At the same time, restores HP by an amount equal to #3[i]% of Castorice's Max HP plus #4[i] for all allies.

skill_trees.name: Contained Dark Tide
skill_trees.desc: After ally targets (excluding Netherwing) receive healing, converts #1[i]% of the healed amount into "Newbud." If Netherwing is on the field, this is converted to Netherwing's HP instead. Each ally target can accumulate a conversion amount up to #2[i]% of the max "Newbud". After any unit takes action, all units reset their accumulated conversion amount.

skill_trees.name: Inverted Torch
skill_trees.desc: When Castorice's current HP is higher than or equal to #1[i]% of her Max HP, her SPD increases by #2[i]%. When Netherwing uses "Breath Scorches the Shadow" and deals fatal damage to all enemies on the field or brings them to a point where their HP cannot be reduced further, Netherwing's SPD increases by #3[i]%, lasting for 1 turn.

skill_trees.name: Where The West Wind Dwells
skill_trees.desc: Each time Netherwing uses "Breath Scorches the Shadow," the DMG dealt increases by #1[i]%. This effect stacks up to #2[i] time(s) and lasts until the end of this turn.
